Name: Les Cramp
Job/Team Function: Responsible for Corporate and Workplace Services (The Service's IT, Estates and Procurement functions); Business Services Directorate (The Redundancy Payments Service, Estate Accounting Services and Insolvency Practitioner Regulation); and the Policy Directorate.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: Robert Burns
Job/Team Function: Investigation into the conduct of bankrupts and company directors and the punishment/prosecution of those suspected of misconduct.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: Anne Willcocks
Job/Team Function: To ensure that insolvency law is kept up to date and fit for purpose; support Ministers on domestic, European Union and international insolvency issues; also to provide advice to official receivers and insolvency practitioners as to the practical application of the insolvency law. To provide National Statistics as well as other statistical analysis on insolvency.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: Graham Horne
Job/Team Function: The administration of bankruptcies and debt relief orders, the compulsory winding up of companies and investigation into misconduct
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: Stephen Speed
Job/Team Function: Oversees an organisation of around 2150 staff in 36 locations across the country who administer bankruptcies and the compulsory winding up of companies; the conduct of bankrupts and company directors; as well as making statutory redundancy and other payments to staff made redundant by employers who cannot or will not pay. Heads of Strategy, Planning & Communication, and Finance & Corporate Governance report directly to the Chief Executive.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills
Unit: Strategy, Planning & Communication and Finance & Corporate Governance
